location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Frances Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a letter to John Adam, Secretary to the Government at Fort William, for the information of the Governor:The enclosd letter reports on a recent visit to Bushire by the Nizam-ud-Doula [Nizam ud Dowlah], during which Bruce encountered Seyd Ali, an agent recently arrived from India.
